summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 NISSAN ROGUE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE ATTEMPTING TO USE THE A/C UNIT, THE CONTACT STATED THAT THERE WAS FIBER GLASS PARTICLES COMING THROUGH VENTS. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THERE WAS EVIDENCE OF FIBER GLASS ON THE FRONT DRIVER AND PASSENGER SEATS, THE REAR SEATS, AND ALSO HER ARTICLE OF CLOTHING. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO WOODY FOLSOM NISSAN OF VIDALIA, 1609 E. 1ST STREET, VIDALIA, GA 30474 TO BE DIAGNOSED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS CLEANED ON THREE SEPARATE OCCASIONS HOWEVER, THE ISSUE RECURRED. THE CONTACT WAS ALSO WAS CONCERNED ABOUT HEALTH ISSUES THAT COULD ARISE FROM BREATHING IN THE FIBER PARTICLES. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE BUT THERE WAS NO ASSISTANCE OFFERED IN HAVING THE ISSUE RESOLVED. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 42,000.
